lead_paragraph: A clean-up of soccer's murky transfer system and an end to the "hoarding" that makes it possible for a top club to have dozens of players out on loan are among the items on Gianni Infantino's to-do list, the FIFA president told Reuters in an interview.

headline.print_headline: Infantino Wants to Clean Up Transfer System
headline.main: Infantino Wants to Clean Up Transfer System
